CustomField.description: If 'Apex Test with Validation' is selected as the type, what test level should be performed. 'Run Specified Tests' will run whatever tests are included on the user stories being deployed
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If 'Apex Test with Validation' is selected as the type, what test level should be performed. 'Run Specified Tests' will run whatever tests are included on the user stories being deployed
CustomField.label: Apex Test Level
